<<<<<<< HEAD
John Barclay his vindication of the intercession of saints, the veneration of relicks and miracles, against the sectaries of the times Book II. Chap. VII. Englished by a person of quality. With allowance. Parænesis ad sectarios. Book 2, Chapter 7. English. Barclay, John, 1582-1621.
[2], 20, [2] p.
printed by Mary Thompson at the entrance into Old-Spring-Garden near Charing-Cross: and sold by Matthew Turner at the Holy-Lamb in Holbourn; and John Lane at the corner of Wild-street, London : 1688.
A translation of Book 2, chapter 7 of: Barclay, John. Parænesis ad sectarios. Final leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

printed by Mary Thompson at the entrance into Old-Spring-Garden near Charing-Cross: and sold by Matthew Turner at the Holy-Lamb in Holbourn; and John Lane at the corner of Wild-street, London : 1688.
